email.subject: Recap
email.body:
Hi,
Welcome back. Something new's come up that a lot of groups are interested in. Entropy and CSEC both have agents after it, but I thought you'd want to check it out too.
First though, lets get you back up to speed. This VM should have SSHCrack and FTPBounce preloaded on it - just break into the linked server and download the file in ~/bin and we'll move on. I think you'll like it.
Once you're done, I've got something from Tex to forward you. I hope you're still sharp - you're going to need it. -Matt

attachments.note:
Programs are run with: ProgramName [PortNumber] Use "Porthack" to break active security once ports are open.
Download bin/XXXX on the target computer and reply to the email. - scp [filename]
Delete logs in /log -rm [* or filename]
